Posts.Content: meganandrileysmom wrote: I had a re-excision and sentinel node biopsy about 10 days ago.   I have 2 questions and would love any insight:  (1) How the heck do I adequately shave.  I tried Nair.  What a joke.  Not one hair came off.  I also tried an electric razor.  Also a joke.  (I have always had trouble even with a straight razor getting a clean shave underarm, but this is crazy).  Any suggestions? (2) The back outer part of my armpit hurts and my tricep feels very heavy.  Is this a cause for concern re lymphedema?  (My mom got it and I am a little paranoid). Thanks in advance!  Log in to post a reply
